Replies.Reply: Three weeks and we're still no closer to cracking this?
I apologize for our methods in getting you here.
An ultra-secret organization dedicated to fighting crime on a global scale. Rob a bank? We're not interested. Kill someone? Not our deal. But you want to melt the polar ice caps? Or vaporize Mt.
We're well aware of that, Mr. Gru.
As you can see, in the wrong hands, the PX-41 serum could be the most devastating weapon on earth.
Fortunately it has a very distinct chemical footprint, and using the latest chemtracking technology, we found traces of it in the Paradise Mall.

Replies.Reply: Precisely. And we believe that one of these shop owners is a master criminal.
And that's where you come in. As an ex-villain, you know how a villain thinks, how a villain acts.
I'm sorry, El Macho? Hadn't we eliminated him as a suspect? After the whole salsa incident?
Yes, but I don't really see any evidence for--
Floyd Eaglesan! Our agents located a secret room in his shop last night, and uh, discovered this!
It's empty, but we found traces of the PX-41 serum in it. He's our man. So somehow, in spite of your incompetence, we solved this one.
Well, now you're free to go back to your "business." Mmmm. Jams and jellies. And it looks like Agent Wilde will be transferring to our Australian branch.
Toodle pip and cheerio, Mr. Gru.
Hi! Agent Lucy Wilde of the AVL.
Sorry, you're gonna have to come with me.
You know you really should announce your weapons after you fire them, Mr. Gru. For example--
Lipstick Taser! Oh, it works so good.
I don't. I'd do it again in a heartbeat. I am not gonna lie--I enjoyed that. Every second of it.
Um, recently an entire top secret lab disappeared from the Arctic Circle. Yeah, the entire lab.
The lab was devoted to experiments involving PX-41, a transmutation serum. What is PX-41, you ask?
The plan is to set you up undercover at a shop in the mall, where hopefully you'll be able to--
Look, I probably shouldn't be saying this, but your work as a villain was kind of amazing, so if you ever want to get back to doing something awesome--give us a call.
Ha! Yaa!      Ho! Ooof!   Zaaa!   Ay-ay-
Oh!     I'll let you get it.
Yeah, what you just saw there was a little something new I've been working on. It's a combination of Jujitsu, Krav Maga, Aztec warfare, and krumping.
On assignment from Silas.   I'm your new partner. Yay!
Well, seems that because of your checkered past, everyone else refused to work with you. But not me. I stepped up. And I'm new, so I kind of have to do what they tell me anyway.
Oh, I'm sorry. I should have known.
Then what do you say you and I break into his restaurant?
I'm checking for laser beam alarm triggers.
You never know what kind of booby traps this guy could have set.
Oh. There's a chicken. Are you lost little guy? You must be lost!
What is wrong with that chicken?
No. Not yet. But hey, maybe you can find something with these x-ray goggles.
How're they working? Tell me, tell me!
Gru, call one of your munchkins!
See if you can get closer.
Hey, there you are.   Oh, who's this?
Those girls totally adore you.       I bet you're a fun dad.
--will make a sound like this-- MEE-
I'm getting nothing so far. I think you need to move around.
Yeah, and you know who made that happen? Huh?
This guy. Nailed it. Amazing, right?
He really thinks it's El Macho.
I don't think so, Miss Lady.
Wow, looks like your date's out for the count. It's like she's been shot with a mild moose tranquilizer.
Well, I think you did it. You just officially had the worst date ever.
Don't worry--it can only get better from here, right? But if it doesn't, you can always borrow my dart gun. I've had to use it on one or two dates myself.
Oh, and uh, just between you and me? You look much better bald.
Well, it's not definite yet. Still figuring it out. Already been working on my accent.
Oh. Here. I wanted to give you this.
Yeah, it's just a memento. Just, you know, from the first time we met.
Yeah, I uh, I better go.    Bye, Gru.
Oh, hey Gru! Turns out you were right about the whole El Macho thing, huh?
Don't worry about me, Gru! I'll be fine. I have survived lots worse than this.
Is there a red one?   It's usually the red one.
This is the best party EVER!!!
Oh no!   A dragon is approaching!
Ooh ooh!   When's the Fairy Princess coming?
It's the fairy princess!   She's coming!
Thank you, Gru-zinkerbell. You're the best fairy princess ever!
I know it's really you, Gru. I'm just pretending for the other kids.
I know what makes you a boy.
It's really smooth. Sometimes I stare at it and imagine a little chick popping out. Peep peep peep.
Are you sure we should be doing this?
We're signing you up for online dating!
Are you really gonna save the world?
But you said you'd help me practice my part for the Mother's Day show!
She kisses my boo-boos She braids my hair My mother is beyond compare We love you, mothers, everywhere!
She kisses my boo-boos She braids my hair--
I don't think I should do this.
I don't even have a mom.
You mean I pretend I have a mom?
Yeah! I do that all the time!
You love her, you love her, you really really love her, and you're gonna get married, and I will be the flower girl, and--
I mean no, he didn't just tell me!
Is there anything I can do to help?
Well, is there anything you could do?
But I didn't get a turn!
And my new mom Lucy is beyond compare.
So when ya goin' on your date?
Remember? Miss Jillian said she was arranging a date for you.
Not if my wish was that I would get a lot of free coins.
AND THEY'RE GOING ON A DATE!
Can I be the first to say--ewwww!
Fear not, for here come the gallant knights to save us!
Wait, did you hear that? It sounded like the twinkling sounds of magical fairy dust.
No one.   Just my friend Avery.
Yes, it's for his own good.
Okay, we need to choose a picture.
Hey, what celebrity do you look like?
And it's time for you to get out there.
Well, we thought we'd come visit you at work.
So, you're saving the world in a garbage can?

Replies.Reply: Good luck saving the world.   Bye!
Oh! Gru, se llama Antonio.       Me llamo Margo.
So I take it the date went well?
No, no, no! What do you mean she's not coming?! I have a backyard full of these little girls who are counting on a visit from a fairy princess!
Because my house is made of candy and sometimes I eat instead of facing my problems.
No, no, no, get off of the limb right now. No limb.
No, Jill's, that is not happening.
I'm sorry.     I did not see you there.
Ky--Kyle!   No, do not do your business on the petunias!
There you go. Those are Fred's.
I don't know who you people think you are, but--
First of all, you've got no proof that I did that. Second, after I did do that, I put it back!
Hmm, you usually don't see that in bunnies.
Okay, I see where this is going, with all the Mission Impossible stuff, but no. No! I am a father now. And a legitimate businessman.
Oh, attitude! That's right! So thanks, but no thanks.
And here's a tip--instead of tasing people and kidnapping them, maybe you should just give them a call!
Oh, yeah, like that's any better!
Hey, I told you guys to get to bed.
Yeah, well, she is a nutjob.    And I'm not going on any date.
Hey Lisa, I was wondering if you--
Scared? Of what? Women?! No, that's bonkers! I just-- I have no interest in going on a date, that's all. Case closed. I'm not scared--
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa! Well, hold the horses. Who are you texting?
Donnie, hang in there, baby!    It's almost Friday.
No! No! Oh, we're making great progress!
Dr. Nefario! Come on, you're kidding, right?
Very well. Let us give you the proper send-off.
The highest honor awarded. To Dr.
Good morning, girls! I have an announcement to make.
No! Stop!      No one is ever getting out there!     Ever!
Okay, now for the announcement:    I have accepted a new job.
Yes, I have been recruited by a top secret agency to go undercover and save the world!
Alright, here is the cupcake recipe I got off the internet.
And don't go nuts with the sprinkles!
Okay, that's weird--why are you here?
What?! No, no "yay." Ramsbottom didn't say anything about a partner.
Yes, he's one of my minions.
Earth to Dave!     You can leave now.
INT: BAKE MY DAY - SAME  Gru and Lucy stand next to each other under a domed lamp lowered from the ceiling.
Gru. And this is Lucy.    And we are closed.
That guy looks exactly like a villain named El Macho. From about twenty years ago.
He was ruthless. He was dangerous.
He had a reputation for pulling off heists using only his bare hands.
Ah, but sadly, like all the greats, El Macho was gone too soon.
He died in the most macho way possible.
Riding a shark with 250 pounds of dynamite strapped to his chest into the mouth of an active volcano.
They never found the body. Oh no.
Alright, alright, homework done, pajamas on, teeth brushed, time for bed.
Well, what do you mean?    Why not?
Well, you don't need one to do the show. I mean, you did the Veterans Day Pageant and you haven't been in combat.
Yes, right. You can do that, can't you?
Alright, hey, hey--   No, no, no, no! Hey, please!
Kevin, Jerry, watch the girls for me, okay?
Dave, Stuart--come this way. With me! Come on!
We're stealth ninjas.    We make no sound.
Alright, El Macho, you're going down.
Get it off of me! Get it off of me! Get it off of me!
Oh, that's an image I'll never get out of my brain. Blagh!
Oh, this is going to be good!
We've been spotted!    Come get us!
Oh! Girls! What are you doing here?
Lucy, these are my girls, Margo, Edith and Agnes. Girls, Lucy.
Oh! Hey! I have an idea! Since Lucy and I have lots of work to do, why don't you girls go and explore the mall!
Here is some money. Go buy some useless mall junk! Some headbands, and--
Are you out of your gourd?    No!
Okay, stop! That is a song of lies. I don't even like her!
Okay! I get it!     I get it!
Wow, this looks interesting.     What is it?
Oh, how about this impressive trinket?
Ah!    And what do we have here?
No thanks. So what's on the other side of the wall?
Margo.    What is going on here?
Well, we really should be going.
You know, they're not in love.
Yes, but there has been a new development, and I'm telling you, this is the guy. You need to arrest him immediately. And his deviously charming son. I'm pretty sure that the son is involved, too.
I think that the son is the mastermind. There's a look.
Evidence schmevidence! I go with my gut, and my gut tells me that this guy is El Macho! Lock him up!
No.   It is him!   And I will prove it!
Hey, Lance! Where the heck is Kevin?
Alright, we need to revisit the number of vacation days you guys get. I can't find anybody anymore!
Agnes! Agnes!     Tell Jillian I'm not here!
We are in a restaurant, you know.
Ah. Well, thank you very much.      I was--
Hahaha. Hoooo. Is it hot in here?
Yeah, you know, as far as dates go, I think I'm good with just the one.
And now you're going to Australia?
I'm never going to see her again.
Oh, I don't--I don't think so, sweetheart.
Okay, here is the question. "Would you like to--to go out on a date?"
All right.     Here we go.   For real this time.
Okay. Let's party. Ah? But first let's go over the rules. Because what is fun without the rules?
Edith, try not to kill anyone.
There must be the standard six feet of space between you and boys.
Ha ha!    I knew it!   You are El Macho!
Nobody believed me! Ho ho!     But I knew you weren't dead!

No--no, forget it! One hundred percent! I am in!
I think--what is--do you hear that--
We need to go home now!    Where's Margo?
Come on, we're leav--hey, what's wrong?
No, it is not cool. Plus, I pretty much knew it was him all along, so if anyone's cool, it's me.

We're getting her out of there.
Hey, guys.     Come on!   Stay focused here!
Curses. Foiled again. These guys captured me.
Hey, hey!    Nice work, Dr. Nefario!

You guys take care of the rest of the minions.

If I'd asked you out on a date, what would you have said?
Hey there, Gru, Mr. Life of the Party!
Okay, fine. Forget Natalie.        How about my cousin Linda?
Oh, oh! I know someone whose husband just died!
I have my friend Shannon here with me! I was thinking you two could get some grub, you know, tear it up! See what happens!
I know you're in there, Gru!
Koom ey lah! Koom ey lah!
Hey, did you guys see the moon landing on TV?
I was talking to Billy the other day.
And I think he likes me.
Ewww! Gru touched Lisa!         Gru touched Lisa!
This is just gonna take un momento.
Have a good day. Come by if you get a chance, okay?
And welcome to the mall family!
What'd they do to you? Pollito?

You coming out?! Or am I gonna go in?!
So good to see you again, mi compadre!
Si! Look at this crazy small world we live in, eh? Come, sit, let me get you something.
Oh, oh, I'm sorry, Pollito is usually very friendly.
That is a pity. Young love is beautiful, no?
You are right, Cabeza de Huevo!
So glad you could make it, mi compadre.
Gru, please. I know that look all too well. It is the look of a broken heart.

You have not lost your touch, my friend.
I was just going to get a cookie.
Oh, I see you have already met my father.
Come on! They're starting the dance!

I take it you're an art lover?
I'd hardly call it a trinket, Mr.

I promise that this wig will transform you from ugly to irresistible.
I was framed! You won't get away with this! Get your mitts off of me! I am a legitimate businessman!
I have to tell you, I was so nervous about tonight. I mean there's just so many phonies out there!
Oh, so do you work out?
I mean, obviously, you don't, but would you consider it? Huh?
Physical fitness is very important to Shannon. As you can tell, right? Huh?
I know someone who can fix that for you. And you'll be talking normal in no time.
Wait a minute. Wait a minute.      Are you wearing a wig?
I knew it.     You're a phony.   I hate phonies.

But now it's time for me to make a spectacular return to evil!

No, he's not Kevin anymore. Now he is an indestructible, mindless killing machine!
And here's the best part! I've got an ARMY OF THEM!

You know what? I am not so convinced that he is in.
Yes, I think he's somewhere around here. You two are close, no?
Oh no! What's happening to my minions?
One push of this button and I send that rocket straight into the same volcano where I faked my death.
We could've ruled the world together, Gru. But now--you're gonna die.

Would you like some peanuts or pretzels?
